backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining three core data stores (pokecoinBalances, pokemonData, payouts) with functions to log/view Pokecoin balances, log/search shiny female Pokemon, and log/view payouts, all scoped per caller Principal.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four implemented features: Pokecoin balance tracking, shiny female Pokemon tracker, payout management system, and Pokemon-themed UI design, each with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of nine frontend files including React Query hooks, three main tracker components (Pokecoin, ShinyFemale, Payout), header/footer components, main App with tabs, and styling configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles defining CSS custom properties for light and dark themes using OKLCH color space, including sidebar, chart, and UI component color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with UTF-8 charset, viewport meta tag, 'Pokecoin App' title, root div, and module script loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component with Internet Identity authentication, three-tab interface (Pokecoins, Shiny Pokemon, Payouts), welcome screen for unauthenticated users, and theme provider wrapper.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying copyright year, app name, and attribution link to caffeine.ai with UTM tracking parameters based on hostname.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header component with Shiny Coin Tracker branding, sparkle icon, and conditional login/logout button based on Internet Identity authentication state.
frontend/src/components/PayoutManager.ts: Payout management component with form to record payouts (amount, currency, date), displays total earnings by currency, and shows payout history with currency selection from predefined list.
React component that displays the current Pokecoin balance and provides a form to update it, using custom hooks for querying and mutating balance data with loading states and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/ShinyFemaleTrack: React component for tracking shiny female Pokemon collection with add/search functionality, displaying a list of Pokemon with badges showing collection count and using mutations to log new entries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous actor instance based on Internet Identity, automatically invalidating and refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient creation with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend operations including Pokecoin balance, shiny female Pokemon tracking, and payout management with automatic cache invalidation on mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom Pokemon-themed color variables (pokecoin-gold, shiny-pink, payout-green) and styled card components with hover effects for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining a Pokemon-themed design system with custom colors (pokecoin-gold, shiny-pink, payout-green, pokemon-blue/red), OKLCH color format, container settings, border radius variables, and custom animations including shimmer and accordion effects.
project_state.json: Project state file for a Pokemon Go companion app tracking Pokecoins, shiny female Pokemon, and Google Play payouts with four existing features implemented and three pending feature requests.
